data.message:
Hello Facebook ,
Can you Please Tell me why i still Haven't got verified, im an unsigned Artist From Morocco, And I Can't Request a Blue Badge to use Facebook Mentions App, So The Only Way is to contact you guys Directly, 

im waiting for your respond

replies.message: Hi Mustapha. We’re currently only accepting verification requests from Pages that represent celebrities, public figures, sports teams, media and entertainment. Please keep in mind that most Pages and profiles, including local businesses, aren't eligible for verification at this time. You can learn more at: http://on.fb.me/1pbsMy9. -Jordan
